We are confident that you'll not only enjoy working with HostMyBytes but that you'll want to work exclusively with HostMyBytes.

What Do Our Clients Say?

    Measure us not by how well we sell but rather the happiness and satisfaction of our clients:
    
    "Been a very great support whenever needed, had packet loss opened a live chat and was fixed almost immediately!" -Sam
    
    "Just signed up for a new 4GB VPS. Activation was quick. Opened tickets for cpanel and centos to be installed. Staff are very friendly!" -Ben
    
    "So far pretty good :) loving the cheap prices and good specs" -Brett
    
    "Very fast, very prompt technical support! Top notch in fact. I've used many other hosting providers and HostMyBytes.com is equal to or better than any of them in support. No matter the issue, nor how often I needed help, they were friendly and just plain fast. Love it." -Robert
